private Integer menuId; private String menuName; private String addedBy; private String addedDate; private String updatedBy; private String updatedDate;
s
select * from mercury_user where nvl(status,0)=0
select nvl(max(user_id),0)+1 as user_id from mercury_user
insert into mercury_user ( user_id, user_name, status, is_admin, added_by, added_date, updated_by, updated_date, name, password )values( #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addedDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password} )
insert into mercury_user_bak ( user_id, user_name, status, is_admin, added_by, added_date, updated_by, updated_date, name, password )values( #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status}, #{isAdmin}, #{addedBy}, #{addedDate}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedDate}, #{name}, #{password} )
